---

Compilation Info: 
```{r knitr_default,echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE,results='hide'}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=F,warning=F)
library(stringr)
suppressMessages(library(lubridate))
library(quarto)

# R info
r_ <- R.Version()
r_pl <- r_$platform
rv <- str_replace_all(r_$version.string, "R version ", "")


# Git version and path
git_cmd <- ifelse(.Platform$OS.type == "windows", "git --version", "git --version")
gv <- str_replace_all(system(git_cmd, intern = TRUE), "git version ", "")

git_path_cmd <- ifelse(.Platform$OS.type == "windows", "where git", "which git")
gp <- system(git_path_cmd, intern = TRUE)

rsvg <- system("which rsvg-convert", intern = TRUE)

# Quarto version and path
qv <- quarto::quarto_version()
qp <- quarto::quarto_path()

# Pandoc version and path
pandoc_cmd <- ifelse(.Platform$OS.type == "windows", "pandoc -v", "pandoc --version")
pv <- str_replace_all(system(pandoc_cmd, intern = TRUE)[1],
                      ifelse(.Platform$OS.type == "windows", "pandoc.exe ", "pandoc "), "")

pandoc_path_cmd <- ifelse(.Platform$OS.type == "windows", "where pandoc", "which pandoc")
pp <- system(pandoc_path_cmd, intern = TRUE)

# Normalize paths to forward slashes
normalize_paths <- function(x) gsub("\\\\", "/", x)
rp <- normalize_paths(R.home())
gp <- normalize_paths(gp)
qp <- normalize_paths(qp)
pp <- normalize_paths(pp)

# Current datetime
dt <- as.character(lubridate::now())
```

Date: `r dt`  
System: `r sessioninfo::os_name()` (`r str_c(Sys.info()["login"]," @ ",Sys.info()["nodename"])`)  
Platform: `r r_pl`  
Quarto: `r qv` @ `r qp` @ `r getwd()`  
R: `r rv` @ `r rp`  
Git: `r gv` @ `r gp`  
Pandoc: `r pv` @ `r pp`
